appKey.title: Laravel Application Key
appKey.description: ERROR PREVENTION: APP_KEY must be either: (1) Empty string for auto-generation, (2) Plain 32 alphanumeric characters, OR (3) Base64-encoded key with 'base64:' prefix. Invalid APP_KEY causes Laravel RuntimeException: 'Unsupported cipher or incorrect key length'. Generate with: php artisan key:generate --show

enabled.title: Enable permissions init container
enabled.description: Whether to run the permissions init container for mounted volumes.

policy.title: Ownership update policy
policy.description: Controls when ownership is set. Use 'Always' to set ownership on every pod start, or 'OnRootMismatch' to only update when the current owner does not match the expected user/group.

nodeSelector.title: The nodeSelector Schema
nodeSelector.description: Default node selector for all components. Can be overridden by individual components.

nodeAffinity.title: The nodeAffinity Schema
nodeAffinity.description: Default node affinity for all components. Can be overridden by individual components.

tolerations.title: The tolerations Schema
tolerations.description: Default tolerations for all components. Can be overridden by individual components.

retentionDays.title: Number of days to retain backups

storageClass.title: Custom storage class for backup PVC

helmResourcePolicy.title: Whether to keep or delete the PVC on Helm uninstall

ldap.title: LDAP Configuration
ldap.description: Configuration for LDAP over TLS support

tlsCacert.title: LDAP TLS CA Certificate
tlsCacert.description: PEM-encoded CA certificate for LDAP over TLS connections. Must be provided together with tlsCacertPath.

tlsCacertPath.title: LDAP TLS CA Certificate Path
tlsCacertPath.description: Path where the LDAP TLS CA certificate will be mounted inside the container. Must be provided together with tlsCacert.
